pageTitle: Town & Country Veterinary Hospital - Veterinarian In Pleasanton, CA USA :: Pleasanton Pet Hotel
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {36586=Clients since 1989, 53359=Call today: 925-462-1667     , 36621=January 9, 2014, 40798=Welcome to the Pleasanton Pet Hotel.  We have been "tucking in" the pets of the Tri-Valley area since 1984.  All of our team members are trained in Pet First Aid, and providing tender loving care.  Both our Pet Hotel Manager, Stephanie, and our Cattery Technican, Linda, have been with Town & Country Veterinary Hospital and the Pleasanton Pet Hotel since 2007.  And our Kennel Technicians, Alyssa and Rachelle have been with us since 2013. Alyssa and Rachelle are ALWAYS snuggling with our 'guests'., 35738=Sign-up using the form or call us at 925-462-1667 to take advantage of this exclusive offer.}
